item.title: Implement ASP.NET Core OpenID Connect with Keycloak to implement Level of Authentication (LoA) requirements
item.description: This post looks at implementing an OpenID Connect client in ASP.NET Core and require a level of authentication (LoA) implemented using Keycloak. The applications are hosted using Aspire. The LoA is requested in Keycloak using the arc_values claim. Code: https://github.com/damienbod/IdentityExternalErrorHandling Setup The applications are implemented using Aspire. An ASP.NET Core application uses an OpenID Connect [â€¦] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2025/07/02/implement-asp-net-core-openid-connect-with-keykloak-to-implement-level-of-authentication-loa-requirements/
